# .github/scenarios

This folder contains two types of scenarios:

## Business Scenarios (S01-S05)

Project complexity and team size scenarios:

- [S01 Simple MVP](S01-simple-mvp.scenario.md) - Solo developer, 4-6 weeks
- [S02 Small Team Startup](S02-small-team-startup.scenario.md) - 3 developers, 12-16 weeks
- [S03 Medium Team SaaS](S03-medium-team-saas.scenario.md) - 10 developers, 24-32 weeks
- [S04 Large Team Enterprise](S04-large-team-enterprise.scenario.md) - 50 people, 48-60 weeks
- [S05 Regulated Healthcare](S05-regulated-healthcare.scenario.md) - HIPAA compliant, 36-48 weeks

## Azure Infrastructure Patterns (A01-A05)

Azure resource deployment patterns:

- [A01 Simple App Service](A01-simple-app-service.md)
- [A02 Hub-Spoke Network](A02-hub-spoke-network.md)
- [A03 App Service + SQL Database](A03-app-service-sql-database.md)
- [A04 Multi-Tier Application](A04-multi-tier-application.md)
- [A05 High-Availability Setup](A05-high-availability-setup.md)
